typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		TotalCost as decimal(19,4),
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SoutchridgeOrdersOutputStream
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitCost as decimal(19,4),
		LineNumber as integer,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SourcebridgeOrderDetailsOutputStream
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as string,
		ReturnDate as string,
		RentalCost as string,
		LateFee as string,
		RewindFlag as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ForthCoffeeTransactionsOutputStream
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		RentalDate as string,
		ReturnDate as string,
		RentalCost as string,
		LateFee as string,
		RewindFlag as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> VanarsdelTrasactionsSourceDataStream
SoutchridgeOrdersOutputStream, SourcebridgeOrderDetailsOutputStream join(SoutchridgeOrdersOutputStream@OrderID == SourcebridgeOrderDetailsOutputStream@OrderID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinOrdersAndDetails
JoinOrdersAndDetails select(mapColumn(
		OrderID = SourcebridgeOrderDetailsOutputStream@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		RentalDate = OrderDate,
		TotalCost,
		CreatedDate = SoutchridgeOrdersOutputStream@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = SoutchridgeOrdersOutputStream@UpdatedDate,
		MovieID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOrdersColumns
SelectOrdersColumns derive(Source = 'Southridge') ~> AddColumns
ForthCoffeeTransactionsOutputStream derive(TotalCost = toDouble(RentalCost) + toDouble(LateFee),
		Source = "ForthCoffee",
		RentalDate = toDate(RentalDate, 'yyyyMMdd'),
		ReturnDate = toDate(ReturnDate, 'yyyyMMdd'),
		CreatedDate = toDate(CreatedDate),
		UpdatedDate = toDate(UpdatedDate)) ~> ForthCoffeeAddColumns
ForthCoffeeAddColumns select(mapColumn(
		OrderID = TransactionID,
		CustomerID,
		MovieID,
		RentalDate,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		TotalCost,
		Source
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ForthCoffeeSelectColumns
AddColumns, ForthCoffeeSelectColumns, VanarsdelSelectColumns union(byName: true)~> Union
VanarsdelTrasactionsSourceDataStream derive(Source = "Vanarsdel",
		TotalCost = toDouble(RentalCost)+ toDouble(LateFee),
		RentalDate = toDate(RentalDate, 'yyyyMMdd'),
		ReturnDate = toDate(ReturnDate, 'yyyyMMdd'),
		CreatedDate = toDate(CreatedDate),
		UpdatedDate = toDate(UpdatedDate)) ~> VanarsdelAddColumns
VanarsdelAddColumns select(mapColumn(
		OrderID = TransactionID,
		CustomerID,
		MovieID,
		RentalDate,
		CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate,
		Source,
		TotalCost
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> VanarsdelSelectColumns
Union sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UnifiedOrders
